title: AI Impact Summit 2026: Sam Altman To Sundar Pichai, Check Who’s Coming, Expo Dates, Agenda And More
description: Next week, India will host the AI Impact Summit from February 16-20 in New Delhi, marking a significant global event in artificial intelligence. Prime Minister Modi and French President Macron will inaugurate the summit on February 19, featuring prominent figures like Sundar Pichai, Sam Altman and Bill Gates. , Technology & Science, Times Now
content: India will be hosting the biggest global technology gatherings of the year next week, as the AI Impact Summit will take place from February 16 to February 20 at Bharat Mandapam in New Delhi, marking what the government describes as the first major gl... [1643 chars]

title: TCS m-cap falls below Rs 10 lakh crore as stock hits 52-week low amid Anthropic AI shock
description: Tata Consultancy Services' stock has plunged, pushing its market value below Rs 10 lakh crore. Fears of artificial intelligence disrupting the IT sector are growing. Stronger-than-expected US jobs data also dampened investor sentiment. This has led to a broad sell-off in the Nifty IT index. Experts suggest the Indian IT sector will continue to face challenges.
content:

title: Elon Musk wants AI agents to run his companies, says need to move faster to become leader
description: Elon Musk has reorganised xAI with a sharper focus on speed, product execution and building advanced AI agents that could eventually run companies. He says moving faster than rivals will decide who leads the artificial intelligence race.
content: Elon Musk has made it clear that he believes the artificial intelligence race will not be won by the biggest company, but by the fastest one. In the latest company-wide meeting at xAI, the billionaire entrepreneur spoke openly about restructuring the... [4383 chars]

title: AI Amplifies Governance Failures, Not New Risks, Says Huawei Thailand Cybersecurity Chief
description: BANGKOK, Feb. 12, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- Artificial intelligence (AI) does not create new risks for organizations but significantly magnifies existing weaknesses in governance, risk management, and compliance (GRC), according to Dr. Pongpisit Wuttidittachotti, Thailand Cybersecurity & Privacy Officer at Huawei Technologies (Thailand) Co., Ltd.

title: Greece Pivots to AI Economy with €150M Investment Push, Minister Says
description: Greece is betting its economic future on artificial intelligence, earmarking 150 million euros ($162 million) in the 2026 investment budget to integrate the technology into the national market, according to Deputy Development Minister Stavros Kalafatis.

title: A year on from DeepSeek shock, get set for flurry of low-cost Chinese AI models
description: One year after Chinese startup DeepSeek rattled the global tech industry with the release of a low-cost artificial intelligence model, its domestic rivals are better prepared, vying with it to launch new models, some designed with more consumer appeal.

title: Why global AI leaders are flocking to the India AI Impact Summit in New Delhi
description: The India AI Impact Summit 2026 in New Delhi has emerged as a focal point for the worlds leading artificial intelligence innovators and technology CEOs. With Sundar Pichai, Sam Altman and Dario Amodei among those attending, the event reflects how Indias market dynamics are attracting global investment interest and signals the countrys growing influence in shaping the future of AI.
